snippet: Family limited partnerships, getting attention this year from wealthy people seeking to take advantage of an expiring tax break, should not be seen as a way to keep a family together, a wealth adviser says.
abstract: Family limited partnerships, getting attention this year from wealthy people seeking to take advantage of an expiring tax break, should not be seen as a way to keep a family together, a wealth adviser says.

headline.main: A Caveat to Those Family Partnerships
